keyMappings:
unmap r
unmap p
unmap t

mapkey <Down> j
mapkey <Up> k
mapkey <Left> h
mapkey <Right> l

unmap <M-Up>
unmap <M-Down>
map <M-Up> scrollPageUp
map <M-Down> scrollPageDown

unmap <C-Left>
unmap <C-Right>
map <C-Left> goBack
map <C-Right> goForward

unmap f
unmap F
unmap a
unmap A
map a LinkHints.activateMode
map A LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab

unmap /
map f enterFindMode
